data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Although some people would like to live in sparsely populated areas, I like to live in densely populated areas. The main reason is that this type of area enables me to meet new people and make friends more easily. For example, after I moved to a very popular city, I met so many people and gained so many experiences just by talking to them. However, this was not the case when I used to live in a rural area. There were not many people that I could find to talk to or just to have a cup of coffee with. Therefore, I would prefer to live in a densely populated area so that I can broaden my social circle and never get bored.
data.referenceText: Would you rather live in a densely populated area or a sparsely populated area? Why?
data.referenceTranslate: 你愿意住在人口稠密的地区还是人烟稀少的地区?为什么?
